docblock.description: SplClassLoader implements the autoloader interoperability standard PSR-0.
The extension of the php file.
Creates a new SplClassLoader that loads classes of the specified path, extension, and namespace.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The extension of the php file.

docblock.description: Installs this class loader on the SPL autoload stack.
Loads the given class or interface.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The name of the class to load.

docblock.description: A custom exception thrown when a file does not exist.
A custom exception thrown when an invalid json string is encountered.
A custom exception thrown when output is not specified.
A custom exception thrown when provider is not specified.
A custom exception thrown when result is a failure.
A custom exception thrown when functionality not implemented.
The main class that glues it all together.
Defines the format of the output.
Gets a reference to a resource.
docblock.long-description: If the resource is not already instantiated, then it creates it.

docblock.description: A HTTP adapter based on Buzz http client.
The contents of the "User-Agent: " header to be used in a HTTP request.
An array of HTTP header fields to set, in the format: array('Content-type: text/plain', 'Content-length: 100')
A reference to a Buzz proxy object.
Construct with an optional cURL proxy object.
Clean up the Buzz proxy object
A HTTP adapter based on curl.
The contents of the "User-Agent: " header to be used in a HTTP request.
An array of HTTP header fields to set, in the format: array('Content-type: text/plain', 'Content-length: 100')
A reference to a cURL proxy object.
Construct with an optional cURL proxy object.
Clean up the cURL proxy object
The http connection interface for the adapter pattern.
Fetches the content from a URL.
Sets the contents of the "User-Agent: " header.
Sets an array of HTTP header fields.

tag.name: param
tag.description: An array of custom HTTP headers.

docblock.description: An iterator over the pages of the result.
A cache of the resource parameters.
Construct an iterator and set the resource.

docblock.long-description: On first request, also set the number of pages.

docblock.description: Returns the key of the current element.
Rewind the Iterator to the first element
Checks if current position is valid
Converts the json string returned from the service to an array.
Convert the json data to an associative array.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The json string returned from the service.

docblock.description: Converts the json string returned from the service to an object.
Convert the json data to an object.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The json string returned from the service.

docblock.description: An interface for the output strategy pattern.
Convert the data to a specified format.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The data returned from the service.

docblock.description: An abstract provider class that sets up a basic provider.
A reference to a concrete http adapter.
Set the default HTTP adapter for a provider.
Set the default HTTP adapter for a provider.
Get the directory that stores the resources for a provider.
docblock.long-description: Usually, this is based on the name of the provider.

docblock.description: A concrete provider based on Sunlight Foundation Congress API v3.
Construct the provider and bind to a HTTP adapter.
Get the domain of the API.
A proxy that provides a surrogate for Buzz http client.

tag.description: since this method is not used

docblock.description: A proxy that provides a surrogate for curl.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The value to be set on option.

docblock.description: An interface for a general http request.
Get information regarding a specific transfer.
Set an option for a connection transfer.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The value to be set on option.

docblock.description: Return a string containing the last error for the current session
An abstract presentation of a resource.
A reference to the FurryBear object.
The parameters sent with the request.
Construct a resource with a FurryBear instance.
Builds the entire query URL, including the request criteria.
Retrieves a result based on some criteria.
A factory that aids creating resource objects.
Create a resource based on a provider and resource name.
docblock.long-description: The rules to create a resource class name are: 1. Explode by underscore. 2. Capitalize each resulting array element. 3. Join back together the array elements into a string.

docblock.description: A base presentation of SunlightFoundation resource.
